titles.title: A bill to modify the boundary of the Hopewell Culture National Historical Park in the State of Ohio, and for other purposes.
Hopewell Culture National Historical Park Boundary Adjustment Act
Hopewell Culture National Historical Park Boundary Adjustment Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 110-480.

bill.summary: Hopewell Culture National Historical Park Boundary Adjustment Act - Modifies the boundary of the Hopewell Culture National Historical Park in Ohio to include certain lands marked for inclusion in the Park. Permits the acquisition of lands added under this Act only from willing sellers.
